name: Prince Gautam
position: Associate Consultant@PwC India | B.Tech + M.Tech - Electrical Engineering | IIT Kharagpur | Ex-ZEE5
about: I'm an IIT Kharagpur alumnus driven by a passion for tackling real-world challenges through innovative problem-solving. My strong technical foundation and analytical prowess enable me to excel in finding creative solutions. I'm a disciplined and self-motivated professional dedicated to personal and collective growth. I'm deeply committed to providing quality education for underprivileged children, firmly believing in the transformative power of knowledge. With a compassionate heart and a drive to empower others, I exemplify strong leadership, effective communication, and exceptional management skills. Let's connect and collaborate to shape a brighter future.
